entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
